attributes.action: review the policy of bankrupts or former bankrupts not being able to stand for parliment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
with the current financial situation, more and more people are being forced into bankruptcy.

i would argue that just because someone has been bankrupt, it should not mean that they are not a fit and proper person to hold office, you could argue that it has given them expieriance of real life, something most mp,s have not !
